definition: along/to follow (a line, tradition etc)/to carry on/to trim (a border with braid, tape etc)/border/edge
aspect particle indicating action in progress
to make known/to show/to prove/to write/book/outstanding
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in

sentences.english: The truck came coughing up the road.
sentences.chinese: 卡車沿著公路噗哧噗哧地開過來。

sentences.english: The old bus bumped along the mountain road.
sentences.chinese: 舊公共汽車沿著山路顛簸行駛。

sentences.english: Dancing and laughing along the beach came the twenty-ninth bather.
sentences.chinese: 跳著，笑著，沿著海灘，第二十九個沐浴者來了。

sentences.english: The horse trotted along the canyon under the burning sun.
sentences.chinese: 馬在烈日下沿著峽谷小跑步。

sentences.english: He flew down the road in a car.
sentences.chinese: 他開著汽車沿著那條路飛馳而去。

sentences.english: We followed a well- beaten path through the forest.
sentences.chinese: 我們沿著常有人行走的小道穿過森林。

sentences.english: His legs stretched out along the curb, dark in the jeans and perfect.
sentences.chinese: 他的腿沿著抑制伸展出，牛仔褲和完成式的黑暗。

sentences.english: Bowel may herniate alongside a drain, with resulting obstruction.
sentences.chinese: 腸管可能沿著引流物疝出，導致梗阻。

sentences.english: Down the Via Dolorosa called the "Way of Suffering."
sentences.chinese: 沿著維亞多樂羅莎大道，這條被稱爲“受苦之路”。

sentences.english: See the pyramids along the nile.
sentences.chinese: 當你遙看金字塔沿著尼羅。

sentences.english: The sledge coasted down the slope.
sentences.chinese: 雪橇沿著山坡向下滑行。

sentences.english: The two of us began walking together along the grass verge.
sentences.chinese: 我們倆沿著長滿草的路邊開始一起散步。

sentences.english: Turn left as you exit the MRT and walk simple just follow the blinking arrow of map below.
sentences.chinese: 出捷運站左轉，只要沿著下列地圖閃爍箭頭即可。

sentences.english: He trudged the deserted road for hours.
sentences.chinese: 他沿著荒蕪的道路喫力地走了幾個小時。

sentences.english: The horse cantered along the sandy path.
Marching along the street is a group of students.
sentences.chinese: 沿著街道行進的是一羣學生。

definition: the rear/far behind the front line
to catch and hold on/to continue/to go on to do sth/to follow/to carry on/then/after that/subsequently/to proceed/to ensue/in turn/in one's turn
perfectly straight/straight as a ramrod/bolt upright
